titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Allyl Cyclo Hexyl Propionate (Allyl hexahydro phenylpropionate).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/6/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on Allyl Cyclo Hexyl Propionate.
